desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When the explosion from Koleda's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</ct> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

1.name: Beat of the Hammer
1.desc: After the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or her enhanced <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, quickly use a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> to increase the Daze dealt by 15%.
1.flavor: Her fiery temper is just a facade. In reality, Koleda's thoughts are quite intricate. For example, she knows when to swing her hammer for a more painful strike.

2.name: Kinetic Recovery
2.desc: When Koleda's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> hits an enemy, she recovers 60 Energy. Can trigger once every 45s.

flavor.0: Koleda believes perfect hammering has its own natural rhythm.
flavor.1: It's like tapping a tambourine, with each hit building up the tempo of the next beat.
flavor.2: Of course, it's hard to say how many taps her "toys" can endure.

3.name: "Mind Your Own!"
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: As a qualified "toy," you better not cause trouble when Koleda starts to get a feel for swinging her hammer. Just take the beating.
flavor.1: —After all, what's the point of resisting?

4.name: Furnace's Glow
4.desc: Koleda gains one stack of Charge (max 2 stacks) when consuming <ct color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</ct> to use her Enhanced <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>. When her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> hits an enemy, she consumes all stacks of Charge to increase the attack's DMG by 18% per stack.

flavor.0: Koleda feels the flames of war as her hammer swings raise the surrounding temperature.
flavor.1: She's now even more flammable and explosive than Ether.

5.name: "You Dare Underestimate Me?"
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: Koleda cares deeply about her role as a young leader potentially causing others to underestimate Belobog Heavy Industries. To compensate, she consistently trains diligently in secret.

6.name: Saturated Blast
6.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> triggers an explosion that hits an enemy, it deals additional DMG equal to 360% of Koleda's ATK.

flavor.0: There are two types of people that Koleda really hates:
flavor.1: Stupid people, and hopelessly stupid people.
flavor.2: Luckily for her, Belobog always has a good supply of strong Ether explosives — plenty to use on the stupid.
